members.signatureBeforeChange: int callWindowProc (int msg, int wParam, int lParam)
members.signatureAfterChange: int callWindowProc (int msg, int wParam, int lParam)
diff: +	* Feature in Windows.  Windows runs a modal message
+	* loop when the user drags a scroll bar.  This means
+	* that mouse down events won't get delivered until
+	* after the loop finishes.  The fix is to run any
+	* deferred messages, including mouse down messages
+	* before calling the scroll bar window proc.

members.signatureBeforeChange: int mouseProc (int nextHandler, int theEvent, int userData)
members.signatureAfterChange: int mouseProc (int nextHandler, int theEvent, int userData)
